title: OnePlus 13R leaked renders show both colorways in detail
description: OnePlus will unveil the 13R on January 7 at the 13's international debut. The OnePlus 13R has been leaked today in a new set of renders depicting two colorways which are expected to be the only ones for this device. excerpt: The device finally becomes official next week. OnePlus will unveil the 13R on January 7 at the 13's international debut. The OnePlus 13R has been leaked...
text: OnePlus will unveil the 13R on January 7 at the 13's international debut. The OnePlus 13R has been leaked today in a new set of renders depicting two colorways which are expected to be the only ones for this device. OnePlus 13R leaked renders The OnePlus 13R has long been rumored to be a rebranded OnePlus Ace 5, but OnePlus has already confirmed that the 13R will have a 6,000 mAh battery, which is 415 mAh smaller than the Ace 5's. So with that in mind, we wouldn't be surprised to see other minor differences between the two handsets. More OnePlus 13R leaked renders For what it's worth, the OnePlus Ace 5 has a 6.78-inch 1264 x 2780 LTPO AMOLED touchscreen with 120 Hz refresh rate and 4,500-nit peak brightness, the Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 SoC at the helm, 12/16GB of RAM, 256GB/512GB/1TB of storage, a triple rear camera system (50 MP main with OIS, 8 MP ultrawide, 2 MP macro), and a 16 MP selfie snapper. Even more OnePlus 13R leaked renders The OnePlus 13R has already been confirmed to sport the same Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 SoC. As for the rest of the specs, it remains to be seen how many it will share with the Ace 5. Source
html:
OnePlus will unveil the 13R on January 7 at the 13's international debut. The OnePlus 13R has been leaked today in a new set of renders depicting two colorways which are expected to be the only ones for this device.


OnePlus 13R leaked renders

The OnePlus 13R has long been rumored to be a rebranded OnePlus Ace 5, but OnePlus has already confirmed that the 13R will have a 6,000 mAh battery, which is 415 mAh smaller than the Ace 5's. So with that in mind, we wouldn't be surprised to see other minor differences between the two handsets.


More OnePlus 13R leaked renders

For what it's worth, the OnePlus Ace 5 has a 6.78-inch 1264 x 2780 LTPO AMOLED touchscreen with 120 Hz refresh rate and 4,500-nit peak brightness, the Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 SoC at the helm, 12/16GB of RAM, 256GB/512GB/1TB of storage, a triple rear camera system (50 MP main with OIS, 8 MP ultrawide, 2 MP macro), and a 16 MP selfie snapper.


Even more OnePlus 13R leaked renders

The OnePlus 13R has already been confirmed to sport the same Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 SoC. As for the rest of the specs, it remains to be seen how many it will share with the Ace 5.

Source
